round_best: Develop a hybrid imaging system that combines lensless camera technology with deep learning-based computational imaging. This system would use AI to reconstruct high-resolution images from the sparse and semantically limited data captured by the lensless cameras. Specifically, train a neural network to recognize patterns and textures associated with concealed objects, leveraging transfer learning from datasets obtained from traditional lens-based systems to improve detection accuracy and reduce training time.
